metadata.Plot: Believing Oil Can Harry is beating the stuffing out of her hero, Mighty Mouse, Pearl Pureheart agrees to work at the villain's rundown laundry. Mighty Mouse arrives at Pearl's home and finds her missing and decides to follow the sawdust trail left by the battered Mighty Mouse doll that Harry used for his ruse and rescues the fair damsel.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
